Review: The location was fantastic due to my travel purpose of attending a 3-day exhibition at the neighboring SMX Convention Center. The hotel had a bridgeway that connect directly to the hotel. The hotel is also quite close to the airport, so getting there was fast and cabs are usually available. The staff was very friendly and prompt. Some minor issue on the faucet handle being too stiff (probably needed to be changed due to calcium deposits?) and also quite a bit of tiny ants running around the work desk from the time I checked in to check out. I called for housekeeping and their only solution was to use bug spray (Baygon), which I stopped them from using, since the room's window cannot be opened (no way to ventilate). I would stay here again if we have an event in the area.
Being near SM helps a lot. We can easily have meals there, shop for what we need and even watch a movie.
Good hotel good location
expensive for what you get
Con: front desk charged me even if i had already paid my booking in full. They were able to reverse the charges though. But it reflected poor practice.

The hotel was ok, with the money that I paid for this hotel I have stated better at a lesser. For convenience was that we had a mall next-door the staff was great always going out of the way to accommodate you , if ever I would see another sale I may stay here again but for the price that I paid I would not. All in all like I said it as ok,

The breakfast buffet had few options. Davao has access to many farms that produce the best fruits and veggies in the country.i hope the hotel management would take advantage of that to improve their guests' dining experience
Great staff. Good room service options. Excellent tv and options. Very comfortable and well appointed room. Gym ok could be upgraded but the equipment is working well enough.

My wife and I rotate between Seda Abreeza, Marco Polo, and Park Inn Radisson depending on the best deal we can get. This stay Park Inn offered the best deal and amenities. It is a well run hotel, and well maintained. The staff you directly engage with are lovely, and helpful. The food - room service is varied, interesting, and well prepared. We didn't take the buffet breakfast as I think it is expensive now @ 600p per person, but often you can make a deal on it. If you are an early morning breakfast person you will have a hard time fiding places to eat. If you can wait until 10 there are some inexpensive and good places in the adjacent mall. There are early morning options, but the best of them has closed shop - so if you can make a deal on the buffet breakfast I would. The gym is satisfactory, but not as good as Marco Polo and Abreeza. With a minimum of investment and care they could make it really good, and I hope they do. Better restauranst in adjacent mall.
very clean room
Good place, friendly staff, great location

I only wish there were more Carlson Hotels in Philippines. These folks know how to do service and their customer loyalty scheme is great. We usually get an upgrade which includes free breakfast and fresh fruit in the room, and we ALWAYS get a nice welcome and priority check-in. This is a busy hotel with a great restaurant and pool and its own walkway access to the SM Mall. Excellent!
It was a very satisfying experience and all was smooth sailing. The room and service was excellent. Worth the money.
Great location right across SM Lanang Davao City mall. Super love their friendly staff and felt very comfortable during our visit
Breakfast buffet is really good and the server is on top of the game we really had a great time...
Great staff, very respectful and accommodating. Excellent location, would definitely stay here again.

Pros: friendly and accommodating staff, fast check-in, request of updating our room status to use the pool was quick and fast. Cons: room is not well-lighted, we booked 2 rooms but the other room had no towels, the towel provided to us was the pool towel, pool to shallow to swim

2nd stay was as good as the first. staff remembered us and greeted us personally. All staff are very accommodating. Only disappointment and its not really the Hotels fault, was that the ATM machine was out of order in the lobby. We had a small problem with wifi connectivity and the front desk had IT come up to help us, even though by that time we had the problem solved, with their suggestions. A very pleasant stay. We will go again.
Expensive and rooms are too small. Not even good. You are paying for the name only

If you have the money to experience high class excellence and royal comfort, Park Inn by Radisson is the perfect hotel for you in Davao City. Location-wise, it's amazing since it's literally 20 steps away from one of the newest and largest malls in the city - SM Lanang Premiere. They even have a walkway connected to the mall itself; you won't have to walk under the heat of the sun to get to the mall. Facility-wise, idk if it's a 5-star hotel but it certainly seems like it, based on all the other 5-star hotels I've stayed in. The bed, the carpet, the air-conditioning system, everything in the room screams 5-star! The pool though is dark blue; I'm not really a fan of pools with dark blue tiles, and it's a bit cramped into their poolside restaurant - it could be improved. And the price is something that ain't practical if you're just gonna go out and about in the city anyway. Park Inn is perfect for staycations in Davao City!
Bed bugs Lack of maintenance dirty carpet Helpful employess

Stayed in a DeLuxe Room for 2 nights as our base for the Golden Wedding of a close relative. Our family consisted of 2 adults and 2 kids. Our room had 1 king bed and a sofa bed. The beds were comfortable, the linens fresh, and the pillows fluffy. The bathroom was nice, with an overhead hot and cold shower. There were free basic toiletries and clean towels. Our room also had a personal ref, a safe, and a desk. Our room had a nice view of SM Lanang and the swimming pool. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The hotel has a a convenient accessible bridge that connects directly to the mall. The swimming pool though was quite small. We came directly from an overnight stay at the Pearl Farm and we haven't eaten our lunch yet so we ordered pancit at the restaurant, since we were in a hurry and we were running late for the wedding. Our order unfortunately arrived late (I had to follow up twice), and the food was very salty. Overall though, our stay at this hotel was quite satisfactory.
Need improvement for breakfast

Pros: very good location just behind SM mall, with a bridge connecting both buildings. Regular taxi readily available at the lobby. Clean modern room. Cons: small swimming pool size limited by the building design.
the wifi is not good ( palpak) if you are in business no wifi and the rm is small

It's my first time in Park Inn and I was amazed. In general the hotel is very good, the location, amenities, room and most of all the staff. Every one of them are Smiling and greeted me everytime I passed by the area. Indeed filipino hospitality is one of a kind. Kudos to the staff of Park Inn.
Everything fine but too expensive breakfast. I hope the hotel shall review the competitive package with breakfast.
Excellent
We love the hotel.
Very nice rooms, outstanding service and very prompt and friendly staff. Very good location. Easy access to SM Lanang Mall via 2nd floor walkway. Will definitely return.

During our stay it was raining for 2 days and we tried to borrow an umbrella but there were only 1 umbrella for the entire hotel. The toilet and shower is dirty. vanity kit and shaving kit are only available upon request, at this price range i expect it to be readily available. The cons about this hotel is their breakfast spreads is good and it is connected to a mall.
Nice hotel and can be recommended to my froend and collegues
Please kindly check the facilities before occupying for the guest..some not working damage water overflowing
The carpet was a little bit dirty. The food was delicious. Near Sm Lanang.
The fact that we can travel with our 6 y/o son using existing bedding at no additional charge. That's why we keep coming back. Also excellent staff and breakfast, nice facilities all-round.

A huge fan of Radisson hotel franchise...so with the Radisson on Park Inn's name I bought it. Its a good hotel, not as I expected as a Radisson though. The room is ok, new I guess..or too new, since the drying of the cement in the bathroom is noticeable and there are some construction going on in that floor in our stay. Huge bed and comfy pillows and sheets. I don't remember any welcome drink, but checking in and checking out is blissfully fast. Buffet breakfast is good, staff are friendly. Would I stay again? I definitely do...
I will recommend this hotel to family and friends

Staff wont go above their robotic standards or tendencies to please the customer. You will miss those hotels that can go out of the box or above the call of duty to make the customers stay worthwhile. Typical of an SM hotel.
friendly staff.. great service and good food... money spent was worth it.
It was a great overnight stay in Perfect Location
Great location by the mall. Clean. Great internet connection. Breakfast options a bit uninspired.
Location is good. The cleaners just have to step up.
Awesome place good service. Jst wished it has bigger pools and more foood choices
Will be back

There is no difference between this hotel and one that is half the price. Although the staff was extremly nice the managment runs it as a budget hotel. The food ok the food service horrible. Slow, somehow Veggie Salsa had meat, part of the order forgotten, and all the while 3 - 4 staff and the manager within 2 meters atteding to what was appearantly a more important table of guests. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone except a corporate Radisson inspector.
Staff were so helpful. ,

The staff was excellent..... The buffet breakfast better than Pearl Farm The room was very comfortable with great internet connection The bedding and pillows are the best Very co-operative with late check-out Elmira the manager is doing a fantastic job
Conveniently located.
Excellent location, walkway to SM mall, Good facilities, very good service from staff, very clean hotel, consistent Wifi. We will certainly stay there again.

I usually have great time staying in this hotel because you get what you paid for but this time, my expectations were not met. Yes the place is very nice with comfortable beds. With my 2 nights, there is no complimentary water given (we have to call to ask for the water we needed), shampoo/bath shower gel is not refilled, internet is too slow i could not work even if i used their LAN, i could hear noises at the hallway at night, no face towels provided, etc. For me, the smallest things should matter if this is the price.
good location beside sm lanang

I booked one room for my sister and my nieces thru online since I am currently working in UAE. I am happy to know that they enjoyed the place, food, and other services. The housekeeping staff are great as well. :) Will surely recommend this hotel to my colleagues abroad.
Hotel staff are attentive to your concerns
One word.. DIRTY!!!
great hotel in the city and super convenient to the mall!
The location is near the mall , hotel is clean , and the staff are accomodating

The hotel is in a great location in Davao, minutes walk from local shopping mall. The rooms are comfy with complimentary wifi, bathroom has rainshower, Breakfast was included and was sufficient. Staff were very friendly and always willing to assist in any way possible. Would recommend this hotel to others.
Very Good Hotel, Will definitely come back
Location is good near the mall , the room is clean, breakfast is good.

This was my 2nd time in Davao and my first time at Park Inn. I chose this hotel because of the proximity to SMX Convention where I was an exhibitor for an event. All the staffs we're very warm and friendly. They made sure that I get the best service and experience. One thing to add probably the food variety for breakfast.
The location is very convenient
Friendly staff. Great mall next to it. Hope the pool is a bit warmer.
Great location for shopping Great staff Need the bathroom to be more than all grey!!
I was kinda this appointed coz there's no bath towels in our room, but when I rang housekeeping they arrived in no time..
Just had to wait for the room to be cleaned.
Pros: Prime Location. Just behind a mall. Clean. Friendly staff. Cons: Somehow expensive.
Park Inn is just very near SM Lanang, so, it is very convenient for our dining and shopping needs.

Ive been booking this hotel ever since since it's very cozy and just beside sm. I can easily shop by passing through the bridge that connects them. It has excellent service and cleanliness of the room. Though it's priceless but it's worth it.

This hotel is f**k. I was stay 1night for business trip. But when I check out. Already some receptionist mistake check out my room. They r spend my time and they didn't apologize. I ask called superviser. But also superviser didn't say about that happend.
easy access from hotel to mall
Rooms are okay.
This is a good just above standard hotel, comfortable, no problem!
Nice
Love the location , very accessible , near the mall , lots of restaurants to choose from .. very nice swimming pool and gym
great location!
Comfortable & nice stay
Staffs are very nice & courteous
This is a nice hotel esp when you have conference near SM Lanang. The hotel connects to SM Lanang which is a plus for visitors!
Not much. Hope the place will be maintained always. Great rooms.
location wise near shopping
Nice location, a bridge connecting to SM.. Nice staff, ready to assist you in your needs..
Keep it up.
Overall package was above average, though the bath gel dispenser run out during my stay. Such should be refilled on a daily basis.
Location is good, room is good, food is good

As with my previous stay in this hotel, i had a pleasant one. Staff were as friendly and facilities were well kept. Only with this stay while I was in my room, i was inconvenienced by loud and noisy guests walking along the hallway and in room/s beside mine. Hotel need more sound proofing for their hallways and rooms or be weary of unruly or noisy guests to avoid bothering other guests.
I was attending a conference at the SMX, which was just across Park Inn. Perfect!

Was over davao for a meeting. I had a nice sleep although when I opened my blackets to get in the bed, I saw some stains in the white blankets. I had to sleep in the next bed (i had a twin bed bedroom) overall, I had a nice sleep

Service of staff is excellent. Location great. Been there before and chose to go back. However, I think the carpet really have to be cleaned or washed properly as I keep feeling itchy when I'm in the room. Even on the bed. Must be dust bugs everywhere. Bathroom looks moldy n old.
Not a bad choice

Spent 2 nights in this hotel. The front desk staff is very professional and efficient. However, the housekeeping staff was unusual. First, they were so obsessed with cleaning all the rooms in my floor as if they had a deadline. Normally, housekeeping would just knock. But they rang the doorbell twice and it was just 830am. Very obtrusive. On my second day, one of the cleaners approached me, looked at his paper, called me by my name, and said "Mr. --, nice to meet you." A simple good morning would've been ok. This guy was bordering on being a stalker. Aside from this, the prices are on the high side considering the room isn't that great. My room had molds on the edges of the floor. The floor was coloured gray and you knew somehow that it wasn't that clean.
Good for money for the class of hotel, if you don't mind the inconvenient of out of the way (from City).

The staff and employees provide excellent service and are very helpful. Given the price though, I expected the room to be a bit bigger with faster internet speed and also better toiletries. But overall the stay was good and I will be back. Thanks :)
Clean and big room. Near SM Lanang Premier and Damaosa Gateway. About 15 - 20 minutes ride to the airport.

I was disappointed since my expectations for this hotel was really high. They are claiming to be the best hotel in Davao but I think that's not true all. • the toiletries are sub par, there are hotels that provide better toiletries at a much more affordable price • no bedroom slippers were provided • the bathroom towels are thin and not fluffy at all, almost threadbare, if compared to other hotels in the area • I heard the fron desk personnel swear under her breath after her colleague endorsed something to her. I was right in front of her and that was very unprofessional. She also wasn't genuinely warm. We did love their pool.
very nice the place and comfy bed.

This hotel is ideally located adjacent to an SM mall in Davao. It can accommodate small conferences or workshops, and has a wide variety of restaurants and shops, cinemas, etc. connected by an elevated walkway to the mall. There is excellent security, and a great breakfast served in the hotel restaurant. There is a very nice swimming pool with food and beverages available at the poolside bar.
The proximity to the mall is the big advantage of this hotel.
Very friendly staff, comfy bed, complete facilities any solo traveler can ask for. Also good to mention super clean hotel. I would stay here again in the near future

Stayed only overnight at Park Inn but it was such a relaxed and comfortable stay that I wish I could have stayed longer. The location is excellent, esp. with the convenience of an SM mall nearby (connected to the hotel, too!) and the airport less than 30 minutes away. The room was very spacious, comfortable and clean. The bed was a dream, esp.with the abundance of pillows. I also liked that I could control the room temperature. Internet was fast and the buffet breakfast was excellent. Would definitely stay there again!
Great hotel except you need to ask for a vanity kit as they dont provide it automatically and the curtains has stains on it.
Clean
Nice relaxing

Internet speed constantly at 2 mbps. Did not have a problem during my stay. Service was excellent. There is a bridge connecting Park Inn to SM Lanang Mall. Seda Abreeza doesn't have this (so if it rains, you need to have an umbrella). Area of SM Lanang mall is more organized and has less traffic than the area of Seda/Abreeza. SM Lanang Mall's transportation hub is more organized. SM is more relaxed, more spacious, mall is more friendly than Abreeza. There are a lot more TV channels to view in Park Inn than in Seda Abreeza. Bed is so comfortable. It has a very “chewy” feel. Bed in SM Abreeza is not as comfortable. There is a couch in the room. In Seda there is no couch.
Good location and clean hotel
hotel is new; facilities are great. top services provided

My filpina girlfriend and I had a a lovely restful and comfortable stay just for two days but picked the hotel for its excellent location behind SM mall and because it suited our particular requirements. Overall we were very pleased with our experience.

The hotel has a professional staff. they have for all problems solutions. The breakfast is very good. Also the direct connection to the shopping mall is an advantage. We recomment this hotel if you like to stay in Davao city.
Very comfortable hotel in excellent location. Friendly staff.
Comfort, good location, great food
Professional and courteous staff, spotless room and excellent food.
Excellent location, just right next to a new mall with lots of food choices and shopping.
It was a good stay.
Location, service, room are excellent!!!

Buffet was the best... I've stayed in a few hotels from Davao, Cagayan and Manila this vacation and nothing else can compare..I'll definitely be staying with them next time.. The staff were very friendly though it gets crowded when they have large volume of costumers with conferences and functions..

I'm glad I booked my hotel 3 months ahead since it was a busy week in Davao City after election. The guest service at the front desk was good, but when I got to my room in the 5th floor I was more into details. The bathroom was not dirty, but I just saw some stains on the floor and thought they forgot to mop it or polish it. Some of the pillow cases were dirty, so I asked them to change the whole bed. The floor/carpet felt like it was not vacuumed. After a few days I asked for a better view of the SM Lanang so they moved me to the 4th floor facing the mall and I was happy, the room that I got was clean and vacuumed. If I were to suggest anything it would be, to improve their cleanliness, mostly in the bathroom, scrub the tiles in the shower and bathroom and vacuum the carpet.

The room's interior is nice and the bed is comfortable. However, this hotel needs to improve on cleanliness. Toilet and bath is not clean and has a lot of mold and mildew so our tendency is to take a shower wearing our flip-flops. The hallway is quite dusty especially the carpet. You can see a thick layer of dust on the floors. I had asthma attack while staying in this hotel.
sometimes the staff at the front desk are not attentive to their visitors/client,,
The caroet was dirty.

Booked this room for my cousin. She was very satisfied with the stay. It was so much comfort. It is new, clean, and equipped with amenities. Food is great as well as the location, SM Mall is just beside it, one bridge away.
Very modern and very western. Great location across from an SM Mall and fairly close to the airport and many eateries.
Nearness to sm lanang and airport worked out well during my stay at davao. Really decent breakfast buffet.
Room well appointed, clean, comfortable -
We enjoyed our stay at Park Inn. The kids had fun at the pool. The room was smallish but ample. The beds though were on the small side because we opted for 2 beds.
Like the location and good security room not so big but clean and got to my standard like to stay here again.

The hotel is in a great location next to the best mall in Davao. Rooms are adequate, not too big but enough for a couple. The staff resolved a problem I had in a very profesional way. I (stupid me ...) forgot my passports and cash in my room and only noticed one day after checkout. The staff and manager did a great job in recovering my valuables, Thanks.
Accessible to mall and restaurants
Close to mall and restaurants
- Very accessible location(lots of places of interest s near the vicinity) - The place was good (you get what you pay for) - Very friendly and accommodating staff

The connection to the cable TV got shot down several times every day. Another thing that bothered me was that when we were checking out it took more than 20 min which is not acceptable. Also the air con in the room failed to work and it got to almost 29 degrees in the room.
Comfortable room, good location and shopping centre is next door
We booked this hotel due to SM mall but there is really nothing to see and do in the mall. Hotel Pool is ok. bathroom and shower are ok. staffs are very good.
Good location and set of facilities. Value for money.
Me and my son enjoyed our stay
Very good place, clean, nice staff, good food with buffet breakfast and dinners for a very afordable price. Almost perfect.

Overall our stay was good. Hotel rooms are clean, with comfortable bed. Staff were friendly, courteous and accomodating. Most of all it is very near the shopping mall, restaurants and church as well. Would definitely recommend it to my relatives and friends.

Park Inn by Radisson Davao is a bit new hotel located at the back of a premier shopping mall. Very near restaurants and church as well. Food choices for buffet breakfast were just enough. Staff were efficient and friendly. Rooms were average in size, comfortable and clean.
very good hotel to stay...very close to the mall....good size bedroom and lovely staff..will stay there again
Great
I've been to other hotels in Davao, and I must say Park Inn is the best. Hotel rooms are clean, bed linen smells really good, breakfast is superb too!

if you want class, comfort and malling, this is the hotel for you, nice thick bed and everything just fits well for the value for money, the hotel is connected to the SM Lanang on the second floor and just a 15 minute ride to Abreeza mall and 30 minutes ride to SM Ecoland if malling is for you....
Accessible location and shopping mall nearby
Location, Staff Professionalism, Comfort
Just average hotel but it was great because its near to mall with lots of restaurants around.
World class, top notch and friendly staff!! Great location walking distance from SM Lanang mall, very delicious food available
location is perfect which is next to the mall. Downside is that there is no flat iron inside the room and no valet parking. Hope they can add those.
beside sm lanang, accessible to shops and dining
Staff
Quite pricey but very much happy with the service! 👍
Quite pricey but very much happy with the service! 👍
Quite pricey but very much happy with the service! 👍
Quite pricey but very much happy with the service! 👍 Shiny at the reception was very helpful and Attended all our needs/requests.
Better than expected from a hotel in a provincial location. Good location and excellent facilities. Made me stay in rather than go out after business meetings.
Convenient, clean and near to mall
Location.Facility.Staff.
x
Except for the lack of its own entrance from the main road, this is the place to stay nowadays in beautiful Davao.
Clean, standard of service and location
The main plus point of the hotel is the location. As far as service, staff, facilities it is what is expected, no more. Cleanliness in the bathrooms continues to be an issue as in previous occasions.
will come back again

It is better to book online thru agoda for a room in park inn rather than thru park inn direct. I was more assured of a room compared to a friend who booked direct thru the hotel during the same dates that i stayed.
In front of smx.
the bed is the best

It was our second time to have stayed in this hotel and every time was just awesome. The staff are extremely courteous and friendly and attentive from the housekeepers to the front desk staff. They recognized us the moment we walked in. The food has varieties and it was pretty much above average. We would definitely stay in this hotel over and over again. :)

We booked the hotel because of its location. We stayed there last September 2015 and it was satisfactory so we booked again last February 2016. I decided to book a function room as well for my son's birthday celebration. I only correspond to the banquet officer through email, and it was practically challenging to get her reply. Since I have already made a downpayment there was no point of cancelling, so we go ahead. On the event, she wasn't there. She didn't include an item which I asked, and when I complained to the supposed to be manager in charge for the event - he claimed that it was all but fault from the banquet officer because she didn't informed them. Talk about owning responsibility, huh? No point to get pissed off since there was celebration. However upon checking out, I was surprised with the bill. Apparently there system is not updated and the downpayment made was not reflected. We demand to speak to the manager. And there she is ... After what seems to be almost half an hour of waiting! While their Housekeeping team is excellent, and the front desk officer is good, how unsatisfactory the service from the banquet officer and weekend manager was what reminds of me the hotel. Not recommended for a breezy celebration!
Place is very clean. Staffs are very accomodating.
Safe, easy to access and proximity to the mall

The hotel has a nice location,conveniently accessible to the mall where you can buy your essential needs. The staff are friendly & courteous. The room is clean. The bathroom is quite dark maybe because of the choice of color of the tiles and the lack of lighting fixtures. It lacks also the usual things that we need in the bathroom like cotton buds, shower cap etc. although there's a card there that says we can request but how can u request when u are already naked. These are essentials in the bathroom of a 3-4star hotel. And the soap is tiny winy. Food was a-ok,not much to be raved about
The hotel is new, so expect a clean and modern facilities. The hotel is just beside the SM Premier Mall and 20 mins away from the airport.
Location, Cleanliness, Bed
Pleasant and accomodating staff, location, clean rooms
We will surely back!
Enjoyed our stay coz the staff were very accommodating

First of all, the hotel is connected to the mall nearby through skybridge which hotel guests can get shopping done very easily. Hotel room is clean and lighting is bright. Tried the lunch and dinner at the restaurant which is good also ( Standard hotel price). Staff are very friendly, Jay and Jessica at the front desk will always greet you with big smile with their heart and they will take care of you. Mark ( the luggage personnel) will go beyond his way to help you. Sam at the pool bar will get all the local tips you need. I feel very welcome at the hotel from the very beginning to the moment I left the hotel. I will definitely come back to this hotel when I come back to Davao for work!
Will book here again and again.. very sumptuous breakfast and very friendly staff! :)
The staff are warm, friendly and always smiling n eager to please. The hotel is clean and comfortable with pool n gym. Convenient to/from the airport. The adjoining mall is a plus for food n shops.
Nice pool

Front desk, restaurant and most other staff were friendly and did a great job. Room however was not clean and specially the bathroom and shower is in dire need of serious cleaning. The floor is not clean and the shower is plain dirty with mold growing between the tiles on the floor and wall. No mat is provided to stand on when showering. Also only two bath towels are available, no towels for hands or face are supplied. Overall a decent stay. I would rate it as a 6.5 due to bathroom issues.
location was just right behind sm lanang. public transport was easy
I enjoyed a lot and I loved it...superb!
very comfortable, friendly staff and good location
